com.seanfisk.firewall_punch.client
Class PeerConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.seanfisk.firewall_punch.client.PeerConnection

public class PeerConnection
extends java.lang.Object

Holds the connection from this client to its peer. The constructor accepts no parameters.

Version:
1.0
Author:
fiskse
